name: bsl-type-safety-analyzer
description: BSL Type Safety Analyzer with automated VSCode extension rebuilding

scripts.rebuild:quick: npm run build:rust && npm run copy:binaries && npm run build:extension
scripts.copy:binaries: cp target/release/*.exe vscode-extension/bin/ || cp target/release/lsp_server target/release/bsl-analyzer target/release/build_unified_index target/release/query_type vscode-extension/bin/

author: BSL Analyzer Team
